alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Collier and north central Mainland Monroe Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from 7 miles east of Golden Gate Estates to near Big Cypress National Preserve. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Golden Gate Estates, Ave Maria, Carnestown, Golden Gate, Copeland, Big Cypress National Preserve, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Orangetree, East Naples, South Blocks Golde, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Picayune Strand State Forest, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Miles City, Jerome and Deep Lake. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe
